a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Children in school: administrative vs household survey data, 2016
Percentage of children of the official primary school age who are in school. The vertical axis shows estimates from
administrative data on enrollment. The horizontal axis shows estimates from household survey data on
attendance. Figures correspond to most recent year with available data.
Net primary-school attendance rate based on household survey data
Net primary-school enrollment rate based on administrative
Data source: UNESCO (via World Bank); Demographic and Health Surveys (DHS)
